name: div
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
Deep Pocket : LJ-10’s deepest pocket offers superior ball security
Flexible Fit : Designed to be worn with two fingers in the pinky pocket, with room for three as some outfielders prefer, allowing extra length and a tighter squeeze on the baseball
Thumb to Pinky Closure : Closes securely from thumb to pinky for a tight grip on the ball
Made in Japan : Handcrafted by master glovemakers for unmatched quality & durability
Lightweight Construction : Built for maximum agility & performance
Individualized Fit : Molds uniquely to each athlete’s hand
